description: This command is used add a domain name that only exists at the respective registry to a dedicated user account. The complementary command is ReleaseDomain.
availability: Only for registrars using our RegistrarOC system.

paramaters.Definition: Provide the respective domain repository. If not given the domain repository will be determined automatically and will be the same as the one used for new domain registrations of the same TLD.
The account in which the domain should be created
The created date of the domain.
Only allowed for dediacted TLDs where the respective registry does not provide an expiration date.
The period is used to calculate the respective accounting. The accounting is only created if PAY is set to 1. If no period is provided the default registration period is used.
Create a respective accounting for all users in the chain.
Only required in order to import .PT domains. It is the ROID of the domain provided by the registry.
